entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
